abstract: Kicking off Give a Day, Get a Disney Day, Thomas O. Staggs and Kermit the Frog vamped when the teleprompter failed.
snippet: Kicking off Give a Day, Get a Disney Day, Thomas O. Staggs and Kermit the Frog vamped when the teleprompter failed.
lead_paragraph: Thomas O. Staggs, the Walt Disney Company’s new theme parks chairman, hopped onto a circular stage built to resemble an enormous can of tuna on Thursday. “Ladies and gentlemen,” he said to the audience gathered at Epcot in Florida, “the world’s largest structure of canned food!”

headline.main: For New Leader of Disney Parks, a Little Improv
headline.print_headline: For New Leader Of Disney Parks, A Little Improv
